source: Compiled from NCL official site, Freestyle Travelers, Prof. Cruise, Norwegian Cruise Blog, and Shine Cruise
disclaimer: Menus rotate and vary by ship, sailing, and season. Prices subject to change. Always verify onboard.

notes: All steaks are USDA-certified and cooked to order. Cover charge includes three courses.
Available on most NCL ships fleet-wide.
Lobster tail available as add-on for supplemental charge.
NCL's signature French restaurant since 2001. Cover charge includes multi-course dinner.
Available fleet-wide. Smart casual dress code.
Extensive French wine list available at additional charge.

pasta: Scarpetta's Spaghetti with Tomato and Basil
Black Pepper Tagliatelle with Braised Short Rib

notes: Created in partnership with LDV Hospitality and Chef Scott Conant.
Signature dish: Scarpetta's Spaghetti with Tomato and Basil.
Available on Norwegian Prima, Viva, Aqua, and Luna.
Modern Mexican restaurant with tableside guacamole. Cover charge includes three courses.
Tequila and mezcal flights available at additional charge.
Available on select ships.

entrees: NY Strip Steak with Grilled Vegetables

notes: Interactive hibachi-style dining with chef performing tableside. Seats 8-10 per table.
Cover charge includes soup, entrée, sides, and dessert.
Reservations strongly recommended; one of NCL's most popular specialty venues.

salad-bar: Gourmet Salad Bar with imported cheeses
Traditional Brazilian Sides (farofa, black beans, fried plantains)

notes: Brazilian steakhouse with continuous tableside meat service (rodízio style).
Green card means 'keep bringing meat,' red card means 'pause.'
Gourmet salad bar included. Cover charge is all-you-can-eat.
Pan-Asian fusion concept with tablet-based ordering. Cover charge includes 4 items.
Additional plates available at supplemental charge.
Available on select newer NCL ships.
Traditional Italian trattoria. Cover charge includes three courses.
Homemade pasta made fresh daily onboard.
Available on most NCL ships fleet-wide.
Upscale seafood restaurant by Iron Chef Geoffrey Zakarian.
Raw bar appetizers may carry supplemental charges.
Available on Norwegian Breakaway and Getaway.

appetizers: Roasted Beet and Goat Cheese Salad

notes: Mediterranean fine dining exclusive to Norwegian Prima class ships.
Multi-course tasting menu with wine pairing available.
Available on Norwegian Prima, Viva, Aqua, and Luna.
Japanese hot pot (shabu-shabu and sukiyaki) dining exclusive to Prima class.
Each guest selects broth, protein, and accompaniments for personalized hot pot.
Available on Norwegian Prima, Viva, Aqua, and Luna.
Dedicated sushi and sashimi bar. Cover charge includes selection of rolls and sashimi.
Premium sake and Japanese whisky available at additional charge.
Available on select NCL ships.

desserts: Fried Bananas with Vanilla Ice Cream

notes: Three appetizers, one entrée, and three desserts included per person.
Exclusive to Norwegian Aqua and Luna.
Curries prepared with traditional Thai herbs and fresh coconut milk.

texas-teasers: Deviled Eggs with Maple Sugar Glazed Bacon
Loaded Fries with Cheddar, Sour Cream, and Jalapeños
smoked-meats: Pitmaster Platter (brisket, spare rib, smoked chicken, jalapeño cheese sausage)

notes: All meats smoked over oak wood onboard the ship.
Live country music during dinner service.
Available on Norwegian Bliss, Encore, and Joy.

dinner: Crab Cakes with Pommery Mustard Sauce
Pan-Seared Steelhead Trout with Beluga Lentils
Surf and Turf (lobster and filet mignon)

notes: Exclusive to guests booked in The Haven suites. No cover charge.
Breakfast, lunch, and dinner served daily with daily specials.
Enhanced menu with premium ingredients not available in main dining rooms.
Main dining room with rotating nightly menus. No reservations required.
Menus rotate on a 7-night cycle with different nightly themes.
Available on most NCL ships.
Second main dining room with same rotating menu as Taste.
Freestyle Dining — no fixed seating times, walk in anytime.
Available on most NCL ships.
Grand main dining room on Breakaway and Getaway class ships.
Same rotating menu as Taste and Savor. Live music during dinner.
Two-deck-high venue with panoramic ocean views.
Main dining room exclusive to Norwegian Prima class ships.
Same rotating nightly menus. Named after the Hudson River.
Available on Norwegian Prima, Viva, Aqua, and Luna.
Second main dining room on Prima class ships.
Same rotating nightly menus as Hudson's.
Available on Norwegian Prima, Viva, Aqua, and Luna.

stations: Salad Bar with fresh greens and toppings
Carving Station with roast beef, turkey, and ham
Asian Wok Station with stir-fry and noodles
Italian Station with pasta and pizza
Indian Station with curries and naan
Dessert Bar with cakes, pastries, and fresh fruit
Grill Station with burgers, hot dogs, and grilled items
Seafood Station with shrimp, mussels, and fish

meals.breakfast: Full buffet 7:00-9:30 AM. Eggs to order, pancakes, waffles, bacon, sausage, pastries, cereals, fresh fruit.
meals.lunch: Full buffet 12:00-2:30 PM. Rotating international stations, carving station, salad bar.
meals.dinner: Full buffet 5:30-9:30 PM. Themed stations rotating nightly.

notes: Main buffet venue, open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
Available fleet-wide. Indoor and outdoor seating on most ships.
Themed dinner nights include Italian, Asian, Mexican, and Seafood.

stations: Kids' favorites station (chicken fingers, mac and cheese, pizza)
Pasta station
Salad bar
Dessert station
Grill items (burgers, hot dogs)

meals.breakfast: Continental breakfast with cereals, pastries, and fruit.
meals.lunch: Kid-friendly lunch buffet with pizza, pasta, and grill items.

notes: Family-friendly casual buffet near the pool deck.
Smaller and less crowded alternative to Garden Cafe.
Available on select NCL ships.
Open-air grill adjacent to the pool deck.
Lunch service only, weather permitting.
Available on most NCL ships.

appetizers: Chicken Wings (Buffalo, BBQ, or Garlic Parmesan)

notes: Irish-themed pub and grill open nearly 24 hours.
Complimentary food menu; drinks available for purchase or with beverage package.
Available on most NCL ships. Named for a Dublin neighborhood.

appetizers: Chicken Wings (Buffalo, BBQ, or Garlic Parmesan)

notes: Updated version of O'Sheehan's on newer NCL ships. Open 24 hours.
Same pub-style complimentary menu with craft beer selection at bar prices.
Available on Norwegian Encore, Prima, Viva, Aqua, and Luna.
Retro-style American diner on select ships.
Complimentary menu. Quick-service style seating.
Available on Norwegian Aqua and Luna.

stations: Tapas — Spanish small plates: Jamón Ibérico, chorizo, manchego, pan con tomate
The Garden / Planterie — Fresh salads and plant-based bowls with seasonal produce
Nudls — Global noodle bar: Pad Thai, Singapore Street Noodles, gnocchi
The Latin Quarter — Latin American: chicken tostadas, guacamole, mushroom tostadas
Q Texas Smokehouse — BBQ: smoked brisket, pork spare ribs, smoked chicken, cornbread
Seaside Rotisserie — Mediterranean: grilled chicken, porchetta, lamb with roasted vegetables
Tamara — Indian cuisine: curries, tikka dishes, fresh naan bread
Just Desserts — Rotating pastries, cakes, and sweet treats
Just Ice Cream — Soft-serve and scooped ice cream

meals.breakfast: Select stations open for grab-and-go breakfast items.

notes: Open-air food hall concept exclusive to Norwegian Prima class.
All stations complimentary. Order at any station, sit anywhere.
Available on Norwegian Prima, Viva, Aqua, and Luna.

ncl-room-service.pricing: Delivery fee: $4.95 (breakfast) / $9.95 (all-day). Free for Haven guests.
notes: Available 24 hours. Breakfast order card hangs on door the night before.
Delivery fee applies per order plus 20% gratuity. Haven suite guests exempt.
Beverages from room service not covered by beverage packages.

items: Mad Milkshakes (Dark Chocolate Oreo, Snickers Bar, Fudge and Cheesecake)
Celebration Platter (gelato, ice cream, fruit, candy — serves 3-4)
notes: Chocolate and dessert shop. All items à la carte, not included in dining packages.
Signature 'Mad Milkshakes' topped with candy, cookies, and whipped cream.
Available on Norwegian Bliss, Breakaway, Encore, Escape, and Getaway.

items: Classic Italian Gelato (chocolate, vanilla, pistachio, stracciatella)
Seasonal Fruit Sorbets (mango, lemon, raspberry, passion fruit)
notes: Italian-style gelato bar with rotating daily flavors.
All items à la carte; not included in dining packages.
Available on select NCL ships.
Artisanal bakery with freshly baked goods made onboard daily.
All items à la carte. Popular for morning coffee and afternoon treats.
Available on select NCL ships.
Licensed Starbucks location onboard. Not covered by beverage packages.
Standard Starbucks menu with seasonal rotating specials.
Available on Norwegian Prima (dedicated location).

sugarcane-mojito-bar.pricing: Cocktails $15–$18; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Signature mojito bar featuring fresh-muddled cocktails.
Specialty mojitos and rum-based cocktails. Live Latin music at select times.
Available on Norwegian Bliss, Dawn, Escape, Gem, Jade, Jewel, Pearl, and Star.

shakers-martini-bar.pricing: Cocktails $15–$18; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Classic cocktail bar with extensive martini menu.
Bartenders craft cocktails tableside. Art deco-inspired décor.
Available on most NCL ships.

the-district-brew-house.pricing: Draft beers $8–$12; cocktails $15–$18; covered by Premium Beverage Package
items: Rotating Local Craft Beers on Tap
notes: Craft beer bar with over 50 bottled beers and rotating taps.
Most beers covered by Premium Beverage Package (up to $15).
Available on Norwegian Breakaway, Escape, and Getaway.

maltings-whiskey-bar.pricing: Whiskey pours $12–$50; cocktails $15–$18; covered by Premium Beverage Package (up to $15)
notes: Curated whiskey bar with worldwide selection.
Premium pours above $15 available at supplemental charge.
Available on Norwegian Bliss, Breakaway, Encore, Epic, Gem, Jade, Jewel, and Pearl.

observation-lounge.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Panoramic lounge at the top of the ship with floor-to-ceiling windows.
Full bar service with comfortable lounge seating. Live music in evenings.
Available on most NCL ships.

atrium-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Central bar in the ship's main atrium. Hub of onboard activity.
Live entertainment and music most evenings.
Available fleet-wide.

waves-pool-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Pool deck bar serving tropical frozen cocktails and cold drinks.
Swim-up bar on select ships. Open during pool hours.
Available fleet-wide.

spice-h2o.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Adults-only outdoor lounge and bar at the stern of the ship.
Daytime relaxation transitions to evening party venue with DJ.
Available on Norwegian Breakaway, Escape, Getaway, Bliss, Encore, and Joy.

vibe-beach-club.pricing: Day pass required ($99–$199); drinks at standard bar pricing
notes: Adults-only sundeck retreat with limited-capacity pass system.
Full bar service, hot tub, and premium loungers. Day pass required for entry.
Available on most NCL ships.

bliss-ultra-lounge.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Nightclub and lounge with dancing, DJ sets, and themed parties.
Late-night venue with full bar service.
Available on select NCL ships.

the-cellars-wine-bar.pricing: Wine by glass $12.50–$25; bottles $40–$200+; covered by Premium Plus Package
items: Curated Wine Flights (red, white, rosé, sparkling)
notes: Wine bar created in partnership with Michael Mondavi family.
Wine flights and education tastings available. Small plates menu.
Available on Norwegian Bliss, Breakaway, Encore, Escape, and Getaway.

syd-normans-pour-house.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Live rock and roll music venue with full bar service.
Nightly live bands and performances. No cover charge.
Available on Norwegian Bliss, Encore, Escape, and Joy.

metropolitan-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Sophisticated cocktail lounge on Prima class ships.
Upscale atmosphere with craft cocktails and premium spirits.
Available on Norwegian Prima, Viva, Aqua, and Luna.

soleil-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Outdoor bar on the pool deck of Prima class ships.
Serving tropical and frozen cocktails in the sun.
Available on Norwegian Prima, Viva, Aqua, and Luna.
Main dining room on Norwegian Sun and other classic ships.
Same rotating nightly menus as other NCL main dining rooms.
Named for the Pacific Ocean. Elegant two-deck dining room.
Pool deck grill serving quick-service favorites.
Open during pool hours for lunch and snacks.
Available on select NCL ships near the Surfside Cafe.

the-mixx.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Cocktail lounge with live DJ and dancing on select evenings.
Full bar service in a contemporary lounge setting.
Available on select NCL ships.

ice-bar.pricing: $30–$40 entry fee includes two cocktails served in ice glasses
items: Vodka-Based Cocktails served in glasses made of ice
notes: Sub-zero bar experience where everything is made of ice — walls, seats, and glasses.
Entry fee includes warm parka and two cocktails. Sessions last approximately 45 minutes.
Available on Norwegian Breakaway, Escape, and Getaway.

entrees: Cioppino (lobster, shrimp, scallops, clams, mussels in tomato-lobster broth)
Simply Grilled Fish (salmon, tuna, cod, or sea bass)

notes: Upscale seafood restaurant, sister venue to Ocean Blue. Cover charge includes three appetizers, one entrée, two sides, and three desserts.
Whole lobster and Surf and Turf carry $25 supplemental charge.
Available on Norwegian Escape.
Contemporary sushi and yakitori bar. Cover charge includes 4 menu items.
Additional items available at supplemental charge.
Available on Norwegian Breakaway, Epic, and Getaway.
Spanish-inspired tapas bar with shareable small plates. Cover charge includes 4 items.
Menu changes daily with wine recommendations for each dish.
Only available on Norwegian Escape.

items: Oysters on the Half Shell (East and West Coast varieties)
notes: Casual raw bar adjacent to Ocean Blue. Cover charge includes 4 items.
Premium items like Seafood Tower and King Crab at supplemental charge.
Available on Norwegian Breakaway and Getaway.

items: Shareable Handheld Plates (global fusion style from Food Republic menu)
notes: Immersive movie and dining experience in oversized recliners with retractable tables.
Menu features shareable handheld items from Food Republic's global fusion concept.
Added to Norwegian Breakaway during 2025 refurbishment, replacing the Spiegel Tent.

appetizers: Dim Sum Selection (har gow, siu mai, char siu bao)
entrees: Steamed Sea Bass with Ginger and Scallion

notes: Chinese restaurant known as Chin Chin, Shanghai's, or Silk depending on ship.
Changed from complimentary to $50 cover charge in 2025.
Available on select NCL ships fleet-wide.
Quick-service Asian noodle bar. Complimentary.
Menu rotates between noodle soups, stir-fry, and rice dishes.
Available on Norwegian Breakaway, Epic, and Getaway.

penrose-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Elegant lobby bar in the three-story Penrose Atrium on Prima class ships.
Central gathering spot with ambient music and refined atmosphere.
Available on Norwegian Prima, Viva, Aqua, and Luna.

haven-lounge.pricing: Complimentary for Haven suite guests; premium spirits at bar pricing
notes: Exclusive lounge reserved for guests booked in The Haven suites.
Complimentary beverages during select hours for Haven guests.
Available on most NCL ships with Haven accommodations.

humidor-cigar-lounge.pricing: Cigars $10–$50; drinks at standard bar pricing
notes: Premium cigar lounge — one of the few places smoking is permitted onboard.
Cigars and drinks purchased separately. Not covered by beverage packages.
Available on most NCL ships.

skyline-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Cocktail lounge with LED screens displaying iconic city skylines that change throughout the evening.
Unique immersive atmosphere. Full bar service.
Available on Norwegian Bliss, Encore, Escape, and Joy.

speedway-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Racing-themed bar located near the go-kart track.
Perfect for a drink before or after racing. Casual outdoor setting.
Available on Norwegian Bliss, Joy, Encore, Prima, and Viva.

the-cavern-club.pricing: No cover charge; standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Beatles tribute music venue licensed by the original Cavern Club in Liverpool.
Live band plays Beatles classics nightly. No cover charge for entry.
Available on Norwegian Bliss and Encore.

the-a-list-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Sophisticated cocktail bar with upscale atmosphere and live music.
Full bar service in an intimate setting.
Available on Norwegian Bliss and Encore.

horizon-lounge.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Cocktail lounge with panoramic ocean views and comfortable seating.
Live entertainment and music on select evenings.
Available on Norwegian Bliss and Encore.

social-comedy-club.pricing: No cover charge; standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Comedy club by day with stand-up performances; transforms into nightclub with DJ after dark.
No cover charge. Full bar service during shows.
Available on Norwegian Encore.

whiskey-bar.pricing: Whiskey pours $12–$50; cocktails $15–$18; covered by Premium Beverage Package (up to $15)
notes: Intimate whiskey lounge on Norwegian Aqua, relocated from Deck 8 to Deck 6.
Features American and international whiskeys plus barrel-aged cocktails.
Available on Norwegian Aqua.
New wine bar concept on Norwegian Aqua replacing The Cellars.
Signature wine menu with by-the-glass and bottle options from around the world.
Available on Norwegian Aqua.

bulls-eye-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Darts-themed bar on Norwegian Aqua replacing the Speedway Bar.
Features dartboards for guest play. Casual atmosphere.
Available on Norwegian Aqua.

studio-lounge.pricing: Complimentary for Studio cabin guests; happy hour beverages included
notes: Exclusive lounge for guests booked in Studio (solo) cabins.
Complimentary beverages during evening happy hour.
Available on most NCL ships with Studio cabins.

bar-21.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Casino bar located adjacent to the casino floor.
Full bar service while gaming. Open during casino hours.
Available on Norwegian Breakaway and Getaway.

prime-meridian-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Waterfront bar with outdoor seating and ocean views.
Located along The Waterfront promenade. Open-air setting.
Available on Norwegian Breakaway, Getaway, and Escape.

headliners-comedy-club.pricing: No cover charge; standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Comedy venue with stand-up comedians and improvisational acts.
No cover charge. Full bar service during performances.
Available on Norwegian Bliss, Breakaway, Escape, Getaway, and others.

sake-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; premium sake at supplemental charge
notes: Japanese-themed bar specializing in sake and Japanese spirits.
Premium sake pours may exceed beverage package limits.
Available on Norwegian Epic.

cascades-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Indoor bar on Norwegian Epic with cascading water features.
Full bar service in a relaxed, atmospheric setting.
Available on Norwegian Epic.

sunset-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Outdoor bar on Norwegian Getaway with sunset views.
Relaxed atmosphere, perfect for evening cocktails.
Available on Norwegian Getaway.

belvedere-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Elegant cocktail lounge on Norwegian Aqua.
Refined atmosphere with signature cocktails and premium spirits.
Available on Norwegian Aqua.

luna-bar.pricing: Standard bar pricing; covered by Premium Beverage Package
notes: Casual cocktail and beer bar on Norwegian Aqua.
Open setting with relaxed atmosphere.
Available on Norwegian Aqua.
